node.doctext:
Alright, so the patches i submitted didn't work.
Here's what I was trying to do (for now). I was putting code in that would allow the user to chose which two colours ENN/newnodes showed. The problem with this being that cool writeups, and pretty much anything with the gradient is still ugly.
Here's how one (not me) could fix it: have a second set of link colours for on top of the gradient.
I have no idea how hard this would be.
node.title: de-fuglifying ekw
